document.full_text: the u.s. military took new steps to shield personnel from radiation spread by japan's crippled nuclear plant on tuesday, redirecting arriving warships to safer waters and telling some forces to limit time outdoors.
document.title: u.s. moves to shield forces from japan radiation risk
lines_and_colors: the u.s. military took new steps to shield personnel from radiation spread by japan's crippled nuclear plant on tuesday, redirecting arriving warships to safer waters and telling some forces to limit time outdoors.
